gobblin.metrics

Interface Taggable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Tagged

    public interface Taggable
    An interface for classes with which Tags can be associated.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addTag(Tag<?> tag)
      Add a single Tag.
      void addTags(Collection<Tag<?>> tags)
      Add a collection of Tags.
      List<Tag<?>> getTags()
      Get all Tags in a list.
      String metricNamePrefix(boolean includeTagKeys)
      Construct a metric name prefix from the Tags.

    • Method Detail

      • addTag

        void addTag(Tag<?> tag)
        Add a single Tag.

        The order in which Tags are added is important as this is the order the tag names appear in the metric name prefix.

        Parameters:
        tag - the Tag to add

      • addTags

        void addTags(Collection<Tag<?>> tags)
        Add a collection of Tags.
        Parameters:
        tags - the collection of Tags to add

      • getTags

        List<Tag<?>> getTags()
        Get all Tags in a list.

        This method guarantees no duplicated Tags and the order of Tags is the same as the one in which the Tags were added.

        Returns:
        all Tags in a list

      • metricNamePrefix

        String metricNamePrefix(boolean includeTagKeys)
        Construct a metric name prefix from the Tags.

        The prefix will include both the key and value of every Tag in the form of key:value if includeTagKeys is true, otherwise it only includes the value of every Tag.

        Parameters:
        includeTagKeys - whether to include tag keys in the metric name prefix
        Returns:
        a metric name prefix constructed from the Tags
